summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to incur an indebtedness against the Seattle Bridge Bond Fund, Series "A" for the purpose of constructing a bridge across the Salmon Bay Waterway at Fifteenth Avenue Northwes4t, as authorized by the people of the City of Seattle at an election held on the second day of March, 1915, under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 34219, and declaring an emergency.
